compare_empty: All packages include personalized coaching, flexible scheduling, and progress tracking.
faq1_q: Can I switch between One-on-One and Group?
faq1_a: Yes! Switch formats between billing periods. We'll help you transition smoothly.
faq2_q: What's the difference between One-on-One and Group?
faq2_a: One-on-One: 60 minutes of undivided attention focused entirely on your goals. Group: 90 minutes with 2–5 learners, collaborative practice at a lower cost per person.
faq3_q: What if I'm a complete beginner?
faq3_a: We work with all levels. Your coach adapts every session to meet you where you are.
faq4_q: What if I miss a session?
faq4_a: Reschedule within your package period. We offer flexible rescheduling with 24-hour notice.
faq5_a: Yes! Custom programs with volume pricing, dedicated support, and detailed progress reporting.
